articles.content:
Mongolian Prime Minister to visit DPRK
      Pyongyang, November 2 (KCNA) -- Mongolian Prime Minister Renchinnyamiin Amarjargal is to visit the DPRK soon on the invitation of Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet.
